(F) Facts

That error will be one of the following types: Named Entities: An entity (names, places, locations, etc.) is changed to a different entity. Numerical Values: Numerical values (ordinals or cardinals), dates, and/or units are changed. Modifiers or Adjectives: The modifiers and adjectives pertaining to a noun are changed. Negation or Antonyms: Introduce or remove a negation or change comparatives to their antonyms. Facts: Trivial factual errors not pertaining to the above classes are introduced in the translations. Dropped Content: A significant clause in the translation is removed. Please identify that error.  Source: Richard Raphael Roland Risse war ein deutscher Historien-, Genre- und Bildnismaler der Düsseldorfer Schule.
Translation: Risse was a German historical, genre and portrait painter of the Düsseldorf School.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer: The translation seems to be accurate and free from any errors. Therefore, the answer is (F) Facts.

Source: Chūō ist einer der 23 Bezirke im Osten der japanischen Präfektur Tokio und liegt im östlichen Zentrum Tokios, der Hauptstadt Japans.
Translation: Cha is one of the 23 districts of Tokyo Prefecture, Japan, located in the western center of Tokyo, Japan.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer: The original sentence states that "Chūō" is one of the districts in the eastern center of Tokyo. The translated sentence, on the other hand, says that "Cha" is one of the districts in the western center of Tokyo. This is a clear error in named entities as the name of the district has been changed from Chūō to Cha and the location has also been changed from eastern to western. Therefore, the error is (D) Named Entities.
